pli-tv-pvr12:0.2: X. An Additional Collection Of Stanzas xkcd: the suttaplex Pali title should be this segment, but instead it currently has the next segment
pli-tv-pvr12:1.2: by reason of what is there making remember,
pli-tv-pvr12:1.3: For what purpose is the Order,
pli-tv-pvr12:1.4: but by reason of what is there an act of Understanding?”
pli-tv-pvr12:2.4: but an act of understanding is individual.
pli-tv-pvr12:3.4: if you would be an adjudicator.
pli-tv-pvr12:4.1: “Do not in haste speak challenging talk
pli-tv-pvr12:4.3: In Sutta, in Discipline, in Parivāra,
pli-tv-pvr12:4.4: in what is laid down, in the principal authorities.
pli-tv-pvr12:5.2: that was done with skill by him of discernment,
pli-tv-pvr12:5.3: Of what was well spoken in conformity with the rules of training,
pli-tv-pvr12:5.4: not destroying a bourn in a future state.
pli-tv-pvr12:5.5: “Seeking for welfare, be intent during (that) time
pli-tv-pvr12:5.6: on what is connected with the goal.
pli-tv-pvr12:6.1: Consider not in haste the mode of speech
pli-tv-pvr12:6.2: of the reproved or the reprover.
pli-tv-pvr12:6.3: “If the reprover says he has fallen,
pli-tv-pvr12:6.4: if he who is being reproved says he has not fallen—
pli-tv-pvr12:7.1: Both, proceeding, should be dealt with
pli-tv-pvr12:7.3: “Acknowledgement is carried out among the conscientious,
pli-tv-pvr12:7.4: it exists not among the unconscientious;
pli-tv-pvr12:7.6: ‘It should be carried out according to what has been said’.”
pli-tv-pvr12:8.1: “Of what kind is an unconscientious one
pli-tv-pvr12:8.2: for whom acknowledgement is not Effective?
pli-tv-pvr12:8.4: What is the kind called an unconscientious individual?”
pli-tv-pvr12:9.3: And goes following a wrong course:
pli-tv-pvr12:9.4: this is the kind called an unconscientious individual.”
pli-tv-pvr12:10.2: this is the kind called unconscientious individual.
pli-tv-pvr12:10.3: And I am asking you another:
pli-tv-pvr12:10.4: what is the kind called a conscientious individual?”
pli-tv-pvr12:11.1: “He does not fall into an offence intentionally,
pli-tv-pvr12:11.2: he does not hide an offence,
pli-tv-pvr12:11.3: He does not go following a wrong course:
pli-tv-pvr12:11.4: this is the kind called a conscientious individual.”
pli-tv-pvr12:12.2: this is the kind called a conscientious individual.
pli-tv-pvr12:12.3: And I am asking you another:
pli-tv-pvr12:12.4: what is the kind called one who reproves according to what is not the rule?”
pli-tv-pvr12:13.1: “He reproves at a wrong time, about what is not fact, with harshness,
pli-tv-pvr12:13.2: and with what is unconnected with the goal;
pli-tv-pvr12:13.3: He reproves with inner hatred, not with a mind of loving-kindness:
pli-tv-pvr12:13.4: this is the kind called one who reproves according to what is not the rule.”
pli-tv-pvr12:14.2: this is the kind called one who reproves according to what is not the rule.
pli-tv-pvr12:14.3: And I am asking you another:
pli-tv-pvr12:14.4: what is the kind called one who reproves according to the rule?”
pli-tv-pvr12:15.1: “He reproves at a right time, about fact, with gentleness,
pli-tv-pvr12:15.2: with what is connected with the goal,
pli-tv-pvr12:15.3: He reproves with a mind of loving-kindness, not with inner hatred:
pli-tv-pvr12:15.4: this is the kind called one who reproves according to the rule.”
pli-tv-pvr12:16.2: this is the kind called one who reproves according to the rule.
pli-tv-pvr12:16.3: And I am asking you another:
pli-tv-pvr12:16.4: what is the kind called one who reproves Ignorantly?”
pli-tv-pvr12:17.1: “He does not know the earlier and the later,
pli-tv-pvr12:17.2: he is unskilled in the earlier and the later,
pli-tv-pvr12:17.3: He does not know the sequence of the connecting words,
pli-tv-pvr12:17.4: he is unskilled in the sequence of the connecting words:
pli-tv-pvr12:17.5: this is the kind called one who reproves ignorantly.”
pli-tv-pvr12:18.2: this is the kind called one who reproves ignorantly.
pli-tv-pvr12:18.3: And I am asking you another:
pli-tv-pvr12:18.4: what is the kind called one who reproves wisely?”
pli-tv-pvr12:19.1: “He knows the earlier and the later,
pli-tv-pvr12:19.2: he is skilled in the earlier and the later,
pli-tv-pvr12:19.3: He knows the sequence of the connecting words,
pli-tv-pvr12:19.4: is skilled in the sequence of the connecting words:
pli-tv-pvr12:19.5: this is kind called one who reproves wisely.”
pli-tv-pvr12:20.2: this is the kind called one who reproves wisely.
pli-tv-pvr12:20.3: And I am asking you another:
pli-tv-pvr12:21.1: “He reproves for falling away from moral habit,
pli-tv-pvr12:21.2: then from right behaviour and view,
pli-tv-pvr12:21.3: And he reproves for a (wrong) mode of livelihood:
pli-tv-pvr12:22.1: Concluded is an Additional Collection of Stanzas
